title: FindingKing 2 Black Velvet 12 Chain Necklace Showcase Easel Display Pads
features: This is a new set of 2 padded black velvet easel necklace displays
These displays highlight the beauty of any necklace and are great for displaying jewelry on your countertops and showcases
Has a collapsible fiberboard easel with stand attached to the back for convenient transport to exhibitions and shows
These take up less space than necklace busts so you can display more pieces in your display area
